meanings.definition: A tax levied on income above a certain threshold.
meanings.sent1: The supertaxes were applied to earnings over $1 million.
meanings.sent2: The government collected supertaxes from wealthy citizens.
meanings.sent3: The supertaxes decided to take a vacation and relax for a change.
meanings.sent4: The concept of supertaxes soared high above the financial landscape.
meanings.sent5: The idea of supertaxes loomed large in the minds of the rich.

meanings.definition: To impose an additional tax on high-income individuals or corporations.
meanings.sent1: The government decided to supertaxes the top earners in the country.
meanings.sent2: They supertaxesed the wealthy to fund public services.
meanings.sent3: The accountant joked that he would supertaxes his boss for a raise.
meanings.sent4: She supertaxesed her way through the financial report with ease.
meanings.sent5: The decision to supertaxes the corporation was met with mixed reactions.
